longBusinessSummary: The Turbotville National Bank provides personal and business banking products and services. It offers business checking and savings accounts; and various types of loans for business and agricultural purposes. The company's personal banking products and services include personal checking/regular checking accounts; personal savings/statement savings, money market deposit, Christmas club, and vacation club accounts; certificates of deposit, and traditional and roth individual retirement accounts; and home equity line of credit, auto loans, and personal loans. It also offers re-order checks, Internet and oncall banking, and mobile banking services; and gift cards, commemorative coins, and safe deposit boxes. The company was founded in 1910 and is based in Turbotville, Pennsylvania. The Turbotville National Bank operates as a subsidiary of Turbotville National Bancorp, Inc.
